meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: She delectated in the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children delectated in the fun games at the carnival.
meanings.sent3: He delectated in the silly jokes his friend told him.
meanings.sent4: The flowers delectated in the warm sunlight after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The puppy delectated in the belly rubs from its owner.

meanings.sent1: They delectated in the beautiful music playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: I delectated in the breathtaking view from the mountaintop.
meanings.sent3: The cat delectated in the cozy warmth of the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The artist delectated in the vibrant colors of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The audience delectated in the talented performance on stage.
